thread.title: Vavi in court for speeding
thread.title_full: Vavi in court for speeding | News24

author: news24.com
title: Vavi in court for speeding
text:
Johannesburg - Former Congress of SA Trade Unions (Cosatu) general-secretary Zwelinzima Vavi appeared in the Edenvale Magistrateâ€™s Court on Monday after being caught speeding.
Vavi was among six people arrested on Sunday for speeding.
Ekurhuleni metro police department spokesperson inspector Kobeli Mokheseng declined to confirm whether Vavi was one of those arrested.
"We arrested six speedsters on the R24 during an operation on Sunday morning.
